1: וַ֭יַּעַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>Then answered</n> בִּלְדַּ֥ד <sup>1085 </sup> <n>Bildad</n> הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <sup>7747 </sup> <n>the Shuhite</n> וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n>
2: עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>How long</n> אָ֤נָה ׀ <sup>575 </sup> <n>How</n> תְּשִׂימ֣וּן <sup>7760 </sup> <n>[will it be ere] ye make</n> קִנְצֵ֣י <sup>7078 </sup> <n>an end</n> לְמִלִּ֑ין <sup>4405 </sup> <n>answer</n> תָּ֝בִ֗ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>understanding</n> וְאַחַ֥ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>and afterwards</n> נְדַבֵּֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>we will speak</n>
3: מַ֭דּוּעַ <sup>4069 </sup> <n>Why</n> נֶחְשַׁ֣בְנוּ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>Wherefore are we counted</n> כַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>as beasts</n> נִ֝טְמִ֗ינוּ <sup>2933 </sup> <n>[and] reputed vile</n> בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>affliction</n>
4: טֹֽרֵ֥ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>He teareth</n> נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>himself</n> בְּאַ֫פּ֥וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>in his anger</n> הַ֭לְמַעַנְךָ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> תֵּעָ֣זַב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>be forsaken</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>shall the earth</n> וְיֶעְתַּק־ <sup>6275 </sup> <n>be removed</n> צ֝֗וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>for thee? and shall the rock</n> מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>country</n>
5: גַּ֤ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> א֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>Yea the light</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> יִדְעָ֑ךְ <sup>1846 </sup> <n>shall be put out</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִ֝גַּ֗הּ <sup>5050 </sup> <n>shall not shine</n> שְׁבִ֣יב <sup>7632 </sup> <n>and the spark</n> אִשּֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>of his fire</n>
6: א֭וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>The light</n> חָשַׁ֣ךְ <sup>2821 </sup> <n>shall be dark</n> בְּאָהֳל֑וֹ <sup>168 </sup> <n>in his tabernacle</n> וְ֝נֵר֗וֹ <sup>5216 </sup> <n>and his candle</n> עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <sup>1846 </sup> <n>shall be put out</n>
7: יֵֽ֭צְרוּ <sup>3334 </sup> <n>shall be straitened</n> צַעֲדֵ֣י <sup>6806 </sup> <n>The steps</n> אוֹנ֑וֹ <sup>202 </sup> <n>of his strength</n> וְֽתַשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>shall cast him down</n> עֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>and his own counsel</n>
8: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שֻׁלַּ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>For he is cast</n> בְּרֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7568 </sup> <n>into a net</n> בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <sup>7272 </sup> <n>by his own feet</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> שְׂ֝בָכָ֗ה <sup>7639 </sup> <n>upon a snare</n> יִתְהַלָּֽךְ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and he walketh</n>
9: יֹאחֵ֣ז <sup>270 </sup> <n>shall take</n> בְּעָקֵ֣ב <sup>6119 </sup> <n>[him] by the heel</n> פָּ֑ח <sup>6341 </sup> <n>The gin</n> יַחֲזֵ֖ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>shall prevail</n> עָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> צַמִּֽים׃ <sup>6782 </sup> <n>[and] the robber</n>
10: טָמ֣וּן <sup>2934 </sup> <n>[is] laid</n> בָּאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for him in the ground</n> חַבְל֑וֹ <sup>2256 </sup> <n>The snare</n> וּ֝מַלְכֻּדְתּ֗וֹ <sup>4434 </sup> <n>and a trap</n> עֲלֵ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> נָתִֽיב׃ <sup>5410 </sup> <n>for him in the way</n>
11: סָ֭בִיב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>on every side</n> בִּֽעֲתֻ֣הוּ <sup>1204 </sup> <n>shall make him afraid</n> בַלָּה֑וֹת <sup>1091 </sup> <n>Terrors</n> וֶהֱפִיצֻ֥הוּ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>and shall drive</n> לְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>him to his feet</n>
12: יְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> רָעֵ֥ב <sup>7457 </sup> <n>shall be hungerbitten</n> אֹנ֑וֹ <sup>202 </sup> <n>His strength</n> וְ֝אֵ֗יד <sup>343 </sup> <n>and destruction</n> נָכ֥וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>[shall be] ready</n> לְצַלְעֽוֹ׃ <sup>6763 </sup> <n>at his side</n>
13: יֹ֭אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>It shall devour</n> בַּדֵּ֣י <sup>905 </sup> <n>the strength</n> עוֹר֑וֹ <sup>5785 </sup> <n>of his skin</n> יֹאכַ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall devour</n> בַּ֝דָּ֗יו <sup>905 </sup> <n>his strength</n> בְּכ֣וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>[even] the firstborn</n> מָֽוֶת׃ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n>
14: יִנָּתֵ֣ק <sup>5423 </sup> <n>shall be rooted out</n> מֵ֭אָהֳלוֹ <sup>168 </sup> <n>of his tabernacle</n> מִבְטַח֑וֹ <sup>4009 </sup> <n>His confidence</n> וְ֝תַצְעִדֵ֗הוּ <sup>6805 </sup> <n>and it shall bring</n> לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>him to the king</n> בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃ <sup>1091 </sup> <n>of terrors</n>
15: תִּשְׁכּ֣וֹן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>It shall dwell</n> בְּ֭אָהֳלוֹ <sup>168 </sup> <n>in his tabernacle</n> מִבְּלִי־ <sup>1097 </sup> <n>because [it is] none</n> ל֑וֹ יְזֹרֶ֖ה <sup>2219 </sup> <n>shall be scattered</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> נָוֵ֣הוּ <sup>5116 </sup> <n>upon his habitation</n> גָפְרִֽית׃ <sup>1614 </sup> <n>of his brimstone</n>
16: מִ֭תַּחַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> שָֽׁרָשָׁ֣יו <sup>8328 </sup> <n>His roots</n> יִבָ֑שׁוּ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>shall be dried up</n> וּ֝מִמַּ֗עַל <sup>4605 </sup> <n>beneath and above</n> יִמַּ֥ל <sup>5243 </sup> <n>be cut off</n> קְצִירֽוֹ׃ <sup>7105 </sup> <n>shall his branch</n>
17: זִֽכְרוֹ־ <sup>2143 </sup> <n>His remembrance</n> אָ֭בַד <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n> מִנִּי־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>from the earth</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has no</n> שֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and he shall have no name</n> ל֝֗וֹ עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> פְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>accept</n> חֽוּץ׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>abroad</n>
18: יֶ֭הְדְּפֻהוּ <sup>1920 </sup> <n>He shall be driven</n> מֵא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>from light</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>into darkness</n> וּֽמִתֵּבֵ֥ל <sup>8398 </sup> <n>out of the world</n> יְנִדֻּֽהוּ׃ <sup>5074 </sup> <n>and chased</n>
19: לֹ֘א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has no</n> נִ֤ין <sup>5209 </sup> <n>He shall neither have son</n> ל֣וֹ וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has no</n> נֶ֣כֶד <sup>5220 </sup> <n>nor nephew</n> בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among his people</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>Nor</n> שָׂ֝רִ֗יד <sup>8300 </sup> <n>nor any remaining</n> בִּמְגוּרָֽיו׃ <sup>4033 </sup> <n>in his dwellings</n>
20: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> י֭וֹמוֹ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>at his day</n> נָשַׁ֣מּוּ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>[him] shall be astonied</n> אַחֲרֹנִ֑ים <sup>314 </sup> <n>They that come after</n> וְ֝קַדְמֹנִ֗ים <sup>6931 </sup> <n>as they that went before</n> אָ֣חֲזוּ <sup>270 </sup> <n>are seized</n> שָֽׂעַר׃ <sup>8178 </sup> <n>horror</n>
21: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> אֵ֭לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>such</n> מִשְׁכְּנ֣וֹת <sup>4908 </sup> <n>Surely such [are] the dwellings</n> עַוָּ֑ל <sup>5767 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> וְ֝זֶ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>and this</n> מְק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>and this [is] the place</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָדַֽע־ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[of him that] knoweth</n> אֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>not God</n> ס
